meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heavy or substantial.
meanings.sent1: The heftiness of the rock made it difficult to lift.
meanings.sent2: The heftiness of the elephant impressed the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent3: The heftiness of the suitcase caused it to topple over comically.
meanings.sent4: The heftiness of the silence in the room was almost tangible.
meanings.sent5: The heftiness of the bookshelf made it a challenge to move.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is large or bulky.
meanings.sent1: The heftiness of the pumpkin surprised the farmer.
meanings.sent2: The heftiness of the package required extra postage.
meanings.sent3: The heftiness of the snowman's nose made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The heftiness of the traffic jam caused delays for hours.
meanings.sent5: The heftiness of the cloud signaled an impending storm.
